verses.text: Aleph. \w I|strong="H0589"\w* \w am|strong="H0589"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w man|strong="H1397"\w* \w that|strong="H7200"\w* \w see|strong="H7200"\w* \w my|strong="H7200"\w* poverty \w by|strong="H1397"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w rod|strong="H7626"\w* \w of|strong="H7626"\w* \w his|strong="H7200"\w* indignation.

Aleph. \w Only|strong="H0389"\w* \w against|strong="H3027"\w* \w me|strong="H7725"\w* \w he|strong="H3117"\w* hath \w turned|strong="H2015"\w*, \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w turned|strong="H2015"\w* \w again|strong="H7725"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w*.

Beth. \w My|strong="H7665"\w* \w skin|strong="H5785"\w* \w and|strong="H7665"\w* \w my|strong="H7665"\w* \w flesh|strong="H1320"\w* he hath made \w old|strong="H1086"\w*, he hath \w broken|strong="H7665"\w* \w my|strong="H7665"\w* \w bones|strong="H6106"\w*.

Beth. \w He|strong="H5921"\w* hath \w built|strong="H1129"\w* \w round|strong="H5362"\w* \w about|strong="H5921"\w* \w me|strong="H5921"\w*, \w and|strong="H1129"\w* \w he|strong="H5921"\w* hath compassed \w me|strong="H5921"\w* \w with|strong="H5921"\w* \w gall|strong="H7219"\w* \w and|strong="H1129"\w* labour.

Beth. He hath \w set|strong="H3427"\w* \w me|strong="H4191"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w dark|strong="H4285"\w* \w places|strong="H4285"\w* \w as|strong="H3427"\w* those \w that|strong="H4191"\w* are \w dead|strong="H4191"\w* \w for|strong="H4191"\w* \w ever|strong="H5769"\w*.

Ghimel. \w He|strong="H3808"\w* hath built against \w me|strong="H3318"\w* round \w about|strong="H1157"\w*, \w that|strong="H3808"\w* \w I|strong="H3808"\w* \w may|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w get|strong="H3318"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w*: \w he|strong="H3808"\w* hath \w made|strong="H3513"\w* \w my|strong="H3318"\w* \w fetters|strong="H5178"\w* \w heavy|strong="H3513"\w*.

Ghimel. \w Yea|strong="H3588"\w*, \w and|strong="H8605"\w* \w when|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w cry|strong="H2199"\w*, \w and|strong="H8605"\w* entreat, \w he|strong="H3588"\w* hath shut \w out|strong="H2199"\w* \w my|strong="H3588"\w* \w prayer|strong="H8605"\w*.

Ghimel. He hath shut up \w my|strong="H1870"\w* \w ways|strong="H1870"\w* \w with|strong="H1870"\w* square \w stones|strong="H1496"\w*, he hath turned \w my|strong="H1870"\w* \w paths|strong="H5410"\w* upside \w down|strong="H1870"\w*.

Daleth. \w He|strong="H1931"\w* \w is|strong="H1931"\w* become \w to|strong="H0693"\w* me \w as|strong="H0693"\w* \w a|strong="H1931"\w* \w bear|strong="H1677"\w* \w lying|strong="H0693"\w* \w in|strong="H0693"\w* \w wait|strong="H0693"\w*: \w as|strong="H0693"\w* \w a|strong="H1931"\w* \w lion|strong="H0738"\w* \w in|strong="H0693"\w* \w secret|strong="H4565"\w* \w places|strong="H4565"\w*.

Daleth. \w He|strong="H7760"\w* hath \w turned|strong="H5493"\w* \w aside|strong="H5493"\w* \w my|strong="H7760"\w* \w paths|strong="H1870"\w*, \w and|strong="H1870"\w* hath broken \w me|strong="H7760"\w* \w in|strong="H1870"\w* \w pieces|strong="H6582"\w*, \w he|strong="H7760"\w* hath \w made|strong="H7760"\w* \w me|strong="H7760"\w* \w desolate|strong="H8076"\w*.

Daleth. He hath \w bent|strong="H1869"\w* \w his|strong="H1869"\w* \w bow|strong="H7198"\w*, \w and|strong="H7198"\w* \w set|strong="H5324"\w* \w me|strong="H5324"\w* as a mark for \w his|strong="H1869"\w* \w arrows|strong="H2671"\w*.

\w He|strong="H0935"\w*. \w He|strong="H0935"\w* hath shot \w into|strong="H0935"\w* \w my|strong="H0935"\w* reins \w the|strong="H0935"\w* daughters \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w his|strong="H0935"\w* \w quiver|strong="H0827"\w*.

\w He|strong="H3117"\w*. \w I|strong="H3117"\w* \w am|strong="H1961"\w* \w made|strong="H1961"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* derision \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, \w their|strong="H3605"\w* \w song|strong="H5058"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w long|strong="H3117"\w*.

He. He hath \w filled|strong="H7646"\w* \w me|strong="H7301"\w* \w with|strong="H7646"\w* \w bitterness|strong="H4844"\w*, he hath inebriated \w me|strong="H7301"\w* \w with|strong="H7646"\w* \w wormwood|strong="H3939"\w*.
Vau. \w And|strong="H8127"\w* he hath \w broken|strong="H1638"\w* \w my|strong="H1638"\w* \w teeth|strong="H8127"\w* one by one, he hath fed me \w with|strong="H8127"\w* \w ashes|strong="H0665"\w*.

Vau. \w And|strong="H5315"\w* \w my|strong="H5315"\w* \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* \w is|strong="H5315"\w* removed far off \w from|strong="H5315"\w* \w peace|strong="H7965"\w*, \w I|strong="H5315"\w* \w have|strong="H7965"\w* \w forgotten|strong="H5382"\w* \w good|strong="H2896"\w* things.

Vau. \w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H0559"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*: \w My|strong="H3068"\w* \w end|strong="H5331"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w hope|strong="H8431"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w perished|strong="H0006"\w* \w from|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*.

Zain. \w Remember|strong="H2142"\w* \w my|strong="H2142"\w* poverty, \w and|strong="H2142"\w* transgression, \w the|strong="H2142"\w* \w wormwood|strong="H3939"\w*, \w and|strong="H2142"\w* \w the|strong="H2142"\w* \w gall|strong="H7219"\w*.

Zain. \w I|strong="H5315"\w* \w will|strong="H5315"\w* \w be|strong="H5315"\w* \w mindful|strong="H2142"\w* \w and|strong="H5315"\w* \w remember|strong="H2142"\w*, \w and|strong="H5315"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* \w shall|strong="H5315"\w* languish \w within|strong="H5921"\w* \w me|strong="H5315"\w*.

Zain. \w These|strong="H2063"\w* things \w I|strong="H3651"\w* \w shall|strong="H3820"\w* \w think|strong="H3820"\w* \w over|strong="H5921"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* \w heart|strong="H3820"\w*, \w therefore|strong="H3651"\w* \w will|strong="H3820"\w* \w I|strong="H3651"\w* \w hope|strong="H3176"\w*.

Heth. \w The|strong="H3588"\w* \w mercies|strong="H7356"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w we|strong="H3588"\w* \w are|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w consumed|strong="H3615"\w*: \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* commiserations \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w failed|strong="H3615"\w*.
Heth. \w They|strong="H1242"\w* are \w new|strong="H2319"\w* \w every|strong="H1242"\w* \w morning|strong="H1242"\w*, \w great|strong="H7227"\w* is thy \w faithfulness|strong="H0530"\w*.

Heth. \w The|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w portion|strong="H2506"\w*, \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w soul|strong="H5315"\w*: \w therefore|strong="H3651"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H3651"\w* \w wait|strong="H3176"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w*.

Teth. \w The|strong="H3068"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w good|strong="H2896"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w them|strong="H3068"\w* \w that|strong="H3068"\w* \w hope|strong="H6960"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w him|strong="H1875"\w*, \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* \w that|strong="H3068"\w* seeketh \w him|strong="H1875"\w*.

Teth. \w It|strong="H3068"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w good|strong="H2896"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* wait \w with|strong="H3068"\w* silence \w for|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w salvation|strong="H8668"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w*.

Teth. \w It|strong="H3588"\w* \w is|strong="H2896"\w* \w good|strong="H2896"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* \w man|strong="H1397"\w*, \w when|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* hath \w borne|strong="H5375"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w yoke|strong="H5923"\w* \w from|strong="H5375"\w* \w his|strong="H5375"\w* \w youth|strong="H5271"\w*.

Jod. \w He|strong="H3588"\w* \w shall|strong="H3427"\w* \w sit|strong="H3427"\w* solitary, \w and|strong="H3427"\w* hold \w his|strong="H5921"\w* peace: \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* hath \w taken|strong="H3427"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w* \w up|strong="H5921"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w himself|strong="H3427"\w*.

Jod. \w He|strong="H5414"\w* \w shall|strong="H6310"\w* \w put|strong="H5414"\w* \w his|strong="H5414"\w* \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w* \w in|strong="H5414"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w dust|strong="H6083"\w*, \w if|strong="H0194"\w* \w so|strong="H5414"\w* \w be|strong="H5414"\w* \w there|strong="H3426"\w* \w may|strong="H5414"\w* \w be|strong="H5414"\w* \w hope|strong="H8615"\w*.

Jod. \w He|strong="H5414"\w* shall \w give|strong="H5414"\w* \w his|strong="H5414"\w* \w cheek|strong="H3895"\w* \w to|strong="H5414"\w* \w him|strong="H5414"\w* \w that|strong="H5414"\w* striketh \w him|strong="H5414"\w*, \w he|strong="H5414"\w* shall \w be|strong="H5414"\w* \w filled|strong="H7646"\w* \w with|strong="H7646"\w* \w reproaches|strong="H2781"\w*.
Caph. \w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \w will|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* cast off \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w ever|strong="H5769"\w*.

Caph. \w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w if|strong="H0518"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* hath cast off, \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H0518"\w* \w also|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H7355"\w* \w mercy|strong="H7355"\w*, according \w to|strong="H0518"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w multitude|strong="H7230"\w* \w of|strong="H7230"\w* \w his|strong="H0518"\w* mercies.

Caph. \w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* hath \w not|strong="H3808"\w* willingly \w afflicted|strong="H3013"\w*, \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* cast off \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w men|strong="H0376"\w*.

Lamed. \w To|strong="H0776"\w* \w crush|strong="H1792"\w* \w under|strong="H8478"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w feet|strong="H7272"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w prisoners|strong="H0615"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w*,

Lamed. \w To|strong="H7200"\w* destroy \w a|strong="H7200"\w* \w man|strong="H0120"\w* wrongfully \w in|strong="H3808"\w* \w his|strong="H7200"\w* judgment, \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* hath \w not|strong="H3808"\w* approved.

Mem. \w Who|strong="H4310"\w* \w is|strong="H2088"\w* \w he|strong="H3808"\w* \w that|strong="H2088"\w* hath \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* \w thing|strong="H2088"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w done|strong="H1961"\w*, \w when|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* commandeth \w it|strong="H1961"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w*?

Mem. \w Shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* both \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* \w and|strong="H6310"\w* \w good|strong="H2896"\w* \w proceed|strong="H3318"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w of|strong="H6310"\w* \w the|strong="H3318"\w* \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w* \w of|strong="H6310"\w* \w the|strong="H3318"\w* Highest?

Mem. \w Why|strong="H4100"\w* hath \w a|strong="H5921"\w* \w living|strong="H2416"\w* \w man|strong="H0120"\w* murmured, \w man|strong="H0120"\w* suffering \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w sins|strong="H2399"\w*?

Nun. Let \w us|strong="H7725"\w* \w search|strong="H2713"\w* \w our|strong="H3068"\w* \w ways|strong="H1870"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* seek, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w return|strong="H7725"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*.

Nun. Nun. \w We|strong="H5168"\w* \w have|strong="H0859"\w* done wickedly, \w and|strong="H6586"\w* provoked thee \w to|strong="H3808"\w* wrath: \w therefore|strong="H0859"\w* thou art inexorable.

Samech. Thou hast covered \w in|strong="H3808"\w* thy \w wrath|strong="H0639"\w*, \w and|strong="H0639"\w* hast struck us: thou hast \w killed|strong="H2026"\w* \w and|strong="H0639"\w* hast \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w spared|strong="H2550"\w*.
Samech. Thou hast set a \w cloud|strong="H6051"\w* before thee, \w that|strong="H5674"\w* our \w prayer|strong="H8605"\w* may not \w pass|strong="H5674"\w* \w through|strong="H5674"\w*.

Samech. Thou hast \w made|strong="H7760"\w* \w me|strong="H7760"\w* \w as|strong="H7760"\w* \w an|strong="H7760"\w* outcast, \w and|strong="H7130"\w* \w refuse|strong="H3973"\w* \w in|strong="H7130"\w* \w the|strong="H7760"\w* \w midst|strong="H7130"\w* \w of|strong="H7130"\w* \w the|strong="H7760"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*.

Phe. \w All|strong="H3605"\w* \w our|strong="H3605"\w* \w enemies|strong="H0341"\w* \w have|strong="H3605"\w* \w opened|strong="H6475"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* \w mouths|strong="H6310"\w* \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w us|strong="H5921"\w*.

Phe. Prophecy \w is|strong="H1961"\w* \w become|strong="H1961"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* us \w a|strong="H1961"\w* \w fear|strong="H6343"\w*, \w and|strong="H1961"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* snare, \w and|strong="H1961"\w* \w destruction|strong="H7667"\w*.

Phe. \w My|strong="H5921"\w* \w eye|strong="H5869"\w* hath \w run|strong="H3381"\w* \w down|strong="H3381"\w* \w with|strong="H5921"\w* \w streams|strong="H6388"\w* \w of|strong="H1323"\w* \w water|strong="H4325"\w*, \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w destruction|strong="H7667"\w* \w of|strong="H1323"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w* \w of|strong="H1323"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*.

Ain. \w My|strong="H3808"\w* \w eye|strong="H5869"\w* \w is|strong="H0369"\w* afflicted, \w and|strong="H5869"\w* hath \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w been|strong="H3808"\w* quiet, because \w there|strong="H0369"\w* \w was|strong="H0369"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* rest:

Ain. \w Till|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w regarded|strong="H7200"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w looked|strong="H7200"\w* \w down|strong="H8259"\w* \w from|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w heavens|strong="H8064"\w*.

Ain. \w My|strong="H3605"\w* \w eye|strong="H5869"\w* hath wasted \w my|strong="H3605"\w* \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* \w because|strong="H3605"\w* \w of|strong="H1323"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w daughters|strong="H1323"\w* \w of|strong="H1323"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* \w city|strong="H5892"\w*.

Sade. My \w enemies|strong="H0341"\w* have chased \w me|strong="H2600"\w* \w and|strong="H6833"\w* caught \w me|strong="H2600"\w* like \w a|strong="H2600"\w* \w bird|strong="H6833"\w*, \w without|strong="H2600"\w* \w cause|strong="H2600"\w*.

Sade. \w My|strong="H3034"\w* \w life|strong="H2416"\w* \w is|strong="H0068"\w* fallen \w into|strong="H0068"\w* \w the|strong="H3034"\w* \w pit|strong="H0953"\w*, \w and|strong="H0068"\w* they have laid \w a|strong="H0068"\w* \w stone|strong="H0068"\w* over \w me|strong="H6789"\w*.

Sade. \w Waters|strong="H4325"\w* \w have|strong="H5921"\w* \w flowed|strong="H6687"\w* \w over|strong="H5921"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* \w head|strong="H7218"\w*: \w I|strong="H0559"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*: \w I|strong="H0559"\w* am \w cut|strong="H1504"\w* \w off|strong="H5921"\w*.

Coph. \w I|strong="H3068"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w called|strong="H7121"\w* \w upon|strong="H7121"\w* thy \w name|strong="H8034"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w from|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w lowest|strong="H8482"\w* \w pit|strong="H0953"\w*.

Coph. Thou hast \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* \w my|strong="H8085"\w* \w voice|strong="H6963"\w*: \w turn|strong="H5956"\w* \w not|strong="H0408"\w* away thy \w ear|strong="H0241"\w* \w from|strong="H8085"\w* \w my|strong="H8085"\w* sighs, \w and|strong="H6963"\w* \w cries|strong="H6963"\w*.

Coph. Thou drewest \w near|strong="H7126"\w* \w in|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, \w when|strong="H3117"\w* \w I|strong="H3117"\w* \w called|strong="H7121"\w* \w upon|strong="H7121"\w* thee, thou saidst: \w Fear|strong="H3372"\w* \w not|strong="H0408"\w*.

Res.
